document.full_text: li na and marion bartoli carry the weight of their nations on thursday when they take on three-times grand slam champion maria sharapova and holder francesca schiavone respectively in the french open semi-finals.
document.title: li and bartoli ride waves of hope on semi-final day
lines_and_colors: li na and marion bartoli carry the weight of their nations on thursday when they take on three-times grand slam champion maria sharapova and holder francesca schiavone respectively in the french open semi-finals.
